channel.title: Server status Error
channel.description:
this may be off topic but when i try to register my server this is showing up [b][i]I HAVE DONE THIS ABOUT 4 TIMES[/i][/b]
This new page is beta, servers may be added and deleted while I finish it. Thanks for being patient. Post comments about the new page here.
Welcome ********!
Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188
Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188
Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188
